comment: Professor Pearce is a great professor, takes the time to really communicate with each student individually if needed, and assigns really interesting and fun writing assignments! Really enjoyed his class, and I learned a good bit!

Prof. Pearce is a good guy. He is very specific on what he wants on his papers. There are no tests, just readings for homework, which aren't tough at all, but you better do them because he asks you questions online which will be graded and are a great grade booster! He's funny and makes class enjoyable. can only skip class 3 times!
